data.name: Sexena: Arena Tales
data.detailed_description:
You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/885510/Smutty_Scrolls/?curator_clanid=35401591


About the Game

Sexena is a blend of visual novel and text-based interactive fiction! Engage in gladiatorial combat against various monster girls- it's conquer or be conquered, sexually and otherwise!



  • Game Over Progression- even when you lose, you win! Unlock new sex scenes and hints!

  • Battle With Wit & Words - narrative puzzle battles, no grinding necessary!

  • Enjoy Lovingly Crafted Art- unique sex artworks, drawn by the famed Doxy!

  • Meet Sexy Monstergirls- many creative lusty monster ladies to meet, fight, and fuck!


A nameless hero- you find yourself lured to a far off town by a mysterious seductress. This town is home to The Arena- where adventurers of all stripes come to test themselves in the heat of battle in hopes of rising through the ranks for prestige and wealth.

However, all is not as appears at first glance. The arena and its competitors hold a dark secret, tied to the reason you were brought here. Can you claim victory in the arena and unravel the mystery that lies ahead?

data.short_description: A visual novel by Doxy! Engage in gladiatorial combat against various monster girls in this interactive 18+ adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains depictions of frequent adult encounters between a variety of anthropomorphized monster girls and a human male. The many things which happen include but are not limited to-

- Anal Sex
- Sex In A Public Setting
- Oral Sex
- Female Domination (Femdom)
- Group Sex

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.
